calendar.create.reason: If calendar creation fails, draft an email instead

email.draft.reason: No fallback available for email drafting

weather.get.reason: No fallback available for weather data

time.get.reason: No fallback available for time data

vision.analyze.reason: If vision analysis fails, provide text description

text.describe.reason: No fallback available for text description

deep.reason: If deep model fails, use planner model

planner.reason: If planner model fails, use micro model

micro.reason: No fallback available for micro model

BROWNOUT.reason: Deep blocked, planner degraded, micro normal during brownout
